column3: Hi! Your Vodafone bill for Rs. 862.32 is due on 13-10-2016. Please ignore if paid. Pay via m-pesa and earn 5% Cashback upto Rs.25 per month for 3 months after registration. Register for m-pesa now. Dial *400#
